form.label: GMC App and Health Info
form.description: Global Monitoring Console App for Splunk (GMC)

h1.p: Welcome $env:user_realname$ to the Global Monitoring Console App for Splunk (GMC)! Below you can find information on the App's various knowledge objects like Dashboards and Lookups

panel.title: GMC Job Execution Details in the last: $time_range$ Hours

search.query: | tstats SUMMARIESONLY=TRUE ALLOW_OLD_SUMMARIES=FALSE latest(Search_Activity.Internal_Scheduler.dispatch_time2) AS dispatch_time latest(Search_Activity.Internal_Scheduler.scheduled_time) AS scheduled_time Max(Search_Activity.Internal_Scheduler.total_run_time2) AS max_run_time Latest(Search_Activity.Internal_Scheduler.search_type2) As search_type Latest(Search_Activity.Internal_Scheduler.info2) AS info latest(Search_Activity.Internal_Scheduler.user2) AS user latest(Search_Activity.Internal_Scheduler.app2) As app values(host) as host FROM DATAMODEL=GMC WHERE nodename=Search_Activity.Internal_Scheduler index=_internal AND Search_Activity.Internal_Scheduler.app2 = "*global_monitoring_console" AND Search_Activity.Internal_Scheduler.search_type2 IN ("datamodel_acceleration", "scheduled") AND (Search_Activity.Internal_Scheduler.savedsearch_name2 IN ("splunk*") OR Search_Activity.Internal_Scheduler.search_type2="datamodel_acceleration") earliest=-$time_range$h@h BY Search_Activity.Internal_Scheduler.savedsearch_name2 | `gmc_drop_dm_object_name(Search_Activity.Internal_Scheduler)` | rename savedsearch_name2 As savedsearch_name | eval savedsearch_name=if(search_type="datamodel_acceleration", "GMC Data Model", savedsearch_name) | convert ctime(dispatch_time) ctime(scheduled_time) | `get_shcluster_label(host)` | `get_saved_searches_info(shcluster_label,app,savedsearch_name)` | `cron_descriptor(cron_schedule)` | table shcluster_label savedsearch_name description info scheduled_time dispatch_time max_run_time cron_schedule cron_schedule_described user dispatch_earliest_time dispatch_latest_time allow_skew description | rename info As "Job Run Status" , shcluster_label As "Search Head" , max_run_time As "Run Time" | `rename_saved_searches_fields`
| inputlookup splunk_rest_saved_searches_sh_kv_store_lookup where app="*global_monitoring_console" AND is_scheduled=1 | stats count

| tstats SUMMARIESONLY=TRUE ALLOW_OLD_SUMMARIES=FALSE count FROM DATAMODEL=GMC WHERE nodename=Search_Activity.Internal_Scheduler index=_internal AND Search_Activity.Internal_Scheduler.app2 = "*global_monitoring_console" AND Search_Activity.Internal_Scheduler.search_type2 IN ("datamodel_acceleration", "scheduled") AND (Search_Activity.Internal_Scheduler.savedsearch_name2 IN ("splunk*") OR Search_Activity.Internal_Scheduler.search_type2="datamodel_acceleration") AND Search_Activity.Internal_Scheduler.info2 = "completed" earliest=-$time_range$h@h BY Search_Activity.Internal_Scheduler.savedsearch_name2 | `gmc_drop_dm_object_name(Search_Activity.Internal_Scheduler)` | stats count

| tstats SUMMARIESONLY=TRUE ALLOW_OLD_SUMMARIES=FALSE count FROM DATAMODEL=GMC WHERE nodename=Search_Activity.Internal_Scheduler index=_internal AND Search_Activity.Internal_Scheduler.app2 = "*global_monitoring_console" AND Search_Activity.Internal_Scheduler.search_type2 IN ("datamodel_acceleration", "scheduled") AND (Search_Activity.Internal_Scheduler.savedsearch_name2 IN ("splunk*") OR Search_Activity.Internal_Scheduler.search_type2="datamodel_acceleration") AND Search_Activity.Internal_Scheduler.info2 = "skipped" earliest=-$time_range$h@h BY Search_Activity.Internal_Scheduler.savedsearch_name2 | `gmc_drop_dm_object_name(Search_Activity.Internal_Scheduler)` | stats count

| tstats SUMMARIESONLY=TRUE ALLOW_OLD_SUMMARIES=FALSE count FROM DATAMODEL=GMC WHERE nodename=Search_Activity.Internal_Scheduler index=_internal AND Search_Activity.Internal_Scheduler.app2 = "*global_monitoring_console" AND Search_Activity.Internal_Scheduler.search_type2 IN ("datamodel_acceleration", "scheduled") AND (Search_Activity.Internal_Scheduler.savedsearch_name2 IN ("splunk*") OR Search_Activity.Internal_Scheduler.search_type2="datamodel_acceleration") AND Search_Activity.Internal_Scheduler.info2 = "failed" earliest=-$time_range$h@h BY Search_Activity.Internal_Scheduler.savedsearch_name2 | `gmc_drop_dm_object_name(Search_Activity.Internal_Scheduler)` | stats count

| inputlookup splunk_rest_data_models_sh_kv_store_lookup where app="*global_monitoring_console" | table shcluster_label title disabled description acceleration cron_schedule earliest_time allow_skew updated | `strftime_format(updated)` | rename title AS "Data Model" , disabled AS Disabled acceleration AS Accelerated earliest_time AS "Summary Range" cron_schedule AS "Summarization Period"

| inputlookup splunk_rest_data_ui_views_sh_kv_store_lookup where app="*global_monitoring_console" | eval Splunk_Tier = case ( match(label, "IDX"), "Indexer", match(label, "SH"), "Search Head", match(label, "UF"), "Forwarder", true(), "Other") | table shcluster_label Splunk_Tier label description updated | `strftime_format(updated)` | `rename_dashboards_fields`

| inputlookup splunk_rest_saved_searches_sh_kv_store_lookup where app="*global_monitoring_console" | fields shcluster_label app savedsearch_name description updated cron_schedule cron_schedule_described Run_Time scheduled_times next_scheduled_time Scheduled_Time Dispatch_Time schedule_window allow_skew | stats values(scheduled_times) as scheduled_times values(next_scheduled_time) as next_scheduled_time last(*) as * by shcluster_label app savedsearch_name | `strftime_format(updated)` | eval scheduled_times=mvindex(scheduled_times,0,3) ,scheduled_times=mvindex(scheduled_times,1,3) , TimeZone=strftime(strptime(next_scheduled_time,"%m/%d/%Y %H:%M:%S"), "%Y%m%d%H%M%S") + " -500" , EST_Time=strftime(strptime(TimeZone,"%Y%m%d%H%M%S %Z"),"%Y/%m/%d %H:%M:%S %Z") | `get_saved_searches_usage(shcluster_label,app,savedsearch_name)` | eval "Job Class" = case ( match(savedsearch_name, "_tracker$"), "Tracking Jobs", match(savedsearch_name, "_lookup_gen"), "Lookup Gen Jobs", true(), "Other") | `cron_descriptor(cron_schedule)` | table shcluster_label savedsearch_name description updated cron_schedule cron_schedule_described Run_Time scheduled_times next_scheduled_time Scheduled_Time Dispatch_Time schedule_window allow_skew | `strftime_format(scheduled_times)` | `strftime_format(next_scheduled_time)` | `rename_saved_searches_fields`
| inputlookup splunk_rest_saved_searches_sh_kv_store_lookup where app="*global_monitoring_console" | stats count AS "Number of Scheduled Jobs"

| inputlookup splunk_rest_admin_transforms_lookup_sh_kv_store_lookup where app="*global_monitoring_console" | `strftime_format(updated)` | eval Index="GMC" | lookup splunk_gmc_kb_csv_lookup Index Field_Name As Lookup OUTPUTNEW Field_Description | rename Field_Description As Description | table shcluster_label Lookup Type Description Filename Collection updated | `rename_lookup_fields`

| inputlookup splunk_rest_data_macros_sh_kv_store_lookup where app="*global_monitoring_console" | eval Macro_Class = case ( match(title, "_reference"), "Gather Reference Info", match(title, "_usage"), "Gather Usage Info", match(title, "^get_"), "Gather Info", match(title, "^rename_"), "Fields Renames", match(title, "^from_|^tstats_"), "Get Data Model Data", match(title, "^normalize_"), "Normalize Fields", match(title, "time"), "Time Manipulation", match(title, "^gmc_setup_"), "Macros for GMC Setup Screen", match(title, "^gmc_"), "Various GMC Macros") | fillnull value="Other GMC Macros" Macro_Class | stats count by Macro_Class

| inputlookup splunk_rest_data_macros_sh_kv_store_lookup where app="*global_monitoring_console" | eval Macro_Class = case ( match(title, "_reference"), "Gather Reference Info", match(title, "_usage"), "Gather Usage Info", match(title, "^get_"), "Gather Info", match(title, "^rename_"), "Fields Renames", match(title, "^from_|^tstats_"), "Get Data Model Data", match(title, "^normalize_"), "Normalize Fields", match(title, "time"), "Time Manipulation", match(title, "^gmc_setup_"), "Macros for GMC Setup Screen", match(title, "^gmc_"), "Various GMC Macros") | fillnull value="Other GMC Macros" Macro_Class | search Macro_Class="$Macro_Class$" AND title="*$title$*" | `strftime_format(updated)` | table shcluster_label title Macro_Class description updated args definition | sort 0 title | `rename_macros_fields`
| inputlookup splunk_rest_data_macros_sh_kv_store_lookup where app="*global_monitoring_console" | search title="*$title$*" | stats count AS "Number of Macros"
